entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 30 mm. Wind light except north 60 km/h gusting to 80 over southern sections early this evening. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
